snippet.title: DAN BACKSLIDE sneaks his way into INVERSE NINJAS as a playable character!
snippet.description:
You can also mod the game now.
Pick it up on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2668870/Inverse_Ninjas_VS_The_Public_Domain/
Or Itch:
https://trainwreckstudios.itch.io/inverse-ninjas-vs-the-public-domain
And check us out on Twitter- or, uh, X I guess. @InverseNinjas. We've got Modding instructions there.
